title: Trump v GOP
description: Plus: Russia and the Trump campaign, and Al Gore hits the trail. This episode: host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, congressional correspondent Susan Davis, and political editor Domenico Montanaro. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
